name: homebridge-tuya-smartlamp-bare
description: A no-frills Homebridge plugin for Tuya-based smart lamps of all types.

scripts.hb:test: cp -a index.js lib config/node_modules/homebridge-tuya-smartlamp/ && homebridge -P config/node_modules/ -U config/ || true
scripts.hb:dev: cp -a index.js lib config/node_modules/homebridge-tuya-smartlamp/ && DEBUG=Tuya* homebridge -D -P config/node_modules/ -U config/ || true

author: evilgoldfish <epdev@icloud.com>
